metadata.title: CVE-2020-11113 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
FasterXML jackson-databind 2.x before 2.9.10.4 mishandles the interactionbetween serialization gadgets and typing, related toorg.apache.openjpa.ee.WASRegistryManagedRuntime (aka openjpa).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11113` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjackson2-databind-java - 2.11.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.11.1-1').
